item.title: Black Hills to Buy NorthWestern Energy for $3.6 Billion
item.description: Black Hills Corp. agreed to acquire another US power and natural gas utility, NorthWestern Energy Group Inc., for about $3.6 billion.

item.title: Black Hills to Buy NorthWestern Energy for $3.6 Billion
